description: The file defines a Flutter widget 'RoomsListScreen' that displays a list of rooms fetched from a service, with loading, error, and empty states, and navigates to a details page on tap.

classes.name: RoomsListScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays a list of rooms, handles loading and error states, and supports navigation to room details.

classes.name: _RoomsListScreenState
classes.description: State class for RoomsListScreen managing fetch logic, UI state, and user interactions.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, creates the RoomsService instance, and fetches the list of rooms.

methods.name: _fetchRooms
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches room data, manages loading and error states.

methods.name: _openDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the room details screen with selected room as argument.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree, displaying list, loading indicator, or error message.
